Resources The Alberta Workerâ€™s Health Centre and Calgary Workers Resource Centre provide free of charge help for people who have issues with health and safety and worker rights: Services are free of charge. Provides a first point of contact for workers facing occupational health and safety issues in their workplace. Will provide support, public legal education, and referrals. Provides free case work and public legal education program if you are having issues accessing your rights in your workplace Dial
A safe workplace takes your physical, mental, and emotional safety into consideration. Your safety at work is protected by 3 pieces of legislation:
Health and Safety Rights In Alberta, workers have 4 basic rights that relate to health safety (information from Alberta Workers Health Centre Current Legislation OHS Act, Regulation and Code
